job.title: Sr Server Software Engineer (Mobile Applications)

with existing Topgolf technologies You will be working with a small and closeknit team of engineers designers and product managers to build the next generation of mobile products for TopgolfbrbrstronguKey Responsibilitiesbrustrongulli Contribute to and drive development of the backend technology stack lili Design and write high quality code lili Design and implement database schema lili Deploy evaluate performance optimize and test software on server lili Collaborate with other internal departments client development design QA lili Document software and features for internal and external engineering teams brbrliulstronguKey Qualificationsbrustrongulli Bachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience required lili Masters degree in Computer Science or a passion for making high quality software lili Exceptional communication skills both written and verbal lili Strong sense of ownership and drive lili Travel less than 5 limited travel potentially out of state conferences brbrliulstronguAbout Topgolf MediabrbrustrongBased in San Francisco Topgolf Media creates and distributes advanced media content enabling the Topgolf community to experience the best times of their lives The division enhances invenue golf games as well as creating experiences outside of the venues with apps websites and virtual experiences In addition Topgolf Media cultivates relationships with global partners sponsors and ambassadors to promote innovation within the Topgolf brand Our goal is to create compelling experiences to engage Topgolf fans of all walks in new innovative ways wwwtopgolfmediacombrbrOur GamesbrbrWGT Golf wwwwgtcom and mobile app stores is the 1 free golf game with over 450 million virtual rounds played and 5 million mobile downloads WGT Golf features 24 famous virtual golf courses including Bandon Dunes Pebble Beach and St Andrews WGT Golf runs the annual Virtual US Open in partnership with the USGA and has partnered with NBCs Golf Channel and David Leadbetter WGT Golf offers a range of virtual golf equipment from leading manufacturers including Callaway Cleveland Nike Ping Srixon and TaylorMadebrbrEqual Opportunity
